parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofpr

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.85

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets speed of <tt>CT_SLIDER</tt> or <tt>CT_XSLIDER</tt> with given idc of topmost user [[dialog]]. 
* Click to arrow - move by line
* Click to scale outside thumb - move by page.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''sliderSetSpeed''' [idc,line,page]
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [idc,line,page]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] of control
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> line: [[Number]] value delta to move the slider when clicking on the outer arrows
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> page: [[Number]] value delta to move the slider when clicking inside the slider bar
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control '''sliderSetSpeed''' [line, page]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> [line, page]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> line: [[Number]] value delta to move the slider when clicking on the outer arrows

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> page: [[Number]] value delta to move the slider when clicking inside the slider bar
</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[sliderSetSpeed]] [101, 0.5, 2];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[sliderPosition]], [[sliderRange]], [[sliderSetPosition]], [[sliderSetRange]], [[sliderSpeed]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.99|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
